{"id":484567529,"lang":"java","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1619266690,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/484567529/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Island Perimeter","memory":"39.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int islandPerimeter(int[][] grid) {\n        int count =0;\n        int row = grid.length;\n        int col = grid[0].length;\n        for (int i =0; i<row; i++){\n          //  int rope=0;\n            \n            for (int j=0; j<col;j++){\n                if (grid[i][j] == 1){\n                    if (j-1>=0){\n                        if (grid[i][j-1]==1){\n                            count= count-1;\n                        }\n                        \n                    }\n                    if (i-1>=0){\n                        if (grid[i-1][j]==1){\n                            count= count-1;\n                        }\n                        \n                    }\n                    if (j<col-1){\n                        if (grid[i][j+1]==1){\n                            count= count-1;\n                        }\n                        \n                    }\n                    if (i<row-1){\n                        if (grid[i+1][j]==1){\n                            count= count-1;\n                        }\n                        \n                    }\n                    count+=4;\n                }\n                \n            }\n        }\n        return count;\n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"island-perimeter"}
